home.title: Welcome to My Digital Space
home.description: Dive into a world where technology meets creativity. Explore my projects, thoughts, and journey through the realms of development and design.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate developer from Louisiana with a flair for creating engaging digital experiences. With a background in both development and design, I enjoy blending aesthetics with functionality. My toolbox includes languages like Go, JavaScript, and frameworks like Gatsby.js, along with a keen interest in open-source projects and community collaboration.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Interested in collaborating or discussing a project? I'd love to hear from you! Reach out to me through any of the channels below, and let's create something amazing together.
